item_name: BT8 Waterproof helmet headset Headset Intercom Wireless Bluetooth Kualitas Tinggi untuk Helm Motor
item_desc:
Welcome to Our Store.Happy shopping!

Wireless Bluetooth Headphones Motorbike Intercom Helmet High-quality Music Headset Hands-free with HD Microphone for Motorcycle Rider

Specially designed for motorcycle riders to listen to music, with great sound quality and line control to adjust volume and switch songs, it's pretty practical.

Features:
* CSR BT 4.0 chip allows you to wirelessly listen to music with this Hi-Fi headphone.
* Fashion design, available to be detachable when you want, let music surrounding your life any time.
* With HD microphone and hands-free function, it can truly free your hands.
* Built-in 150mAh rechargeable Li-ion battery supplies you with long standby and working time.
* Sound reminder function, easy to set the device according to sound reminds.

Specifications:
BT Version: 4.0+EDR
BT Name: BT8
Frequency: 2.402GHz-2.480GHz
Range: 20-30 meters (depending on devices)
Transmission Distance of Microphone: ≤ 1 meter
Charging Voltage: 5V
Battery: 3.7V/150mAh (402030)
Playback Time: ≤ 10 hours
Charging Time: ≤ 1 hour
Standby Time: ≤ 48 hours
Color: Black
Item weight: approx. 45g / 1.58oz
Package size: approx. 23.3 * 9.8 * 4.7cm / 9.17 * 3.85 * 1.85in
Package weight: approx. 108g / 3.80oz

Package List:
1 * Earphone
2 * Stickers
1 * User Manual (English)
